title: Omae ni dake wa Ijiwaru shitai
original_name: お前にだけはイジワルしたい
sinopse:
1-4. Omae ni dake wa Ijiwaru shitai: Tsumetai Osananajimi no Amai Yubi (You're the One I Want to Tease: A Cold Childhood Friend's Warm Fingers)
5-7. Otouto-kei Osananajimi ga Yajuu-ka shimashite. 8. Kare no Are ga Katakute Komattemasu (Naki) (His You-Know-What Is Way Too Hard!) 9. Untitled
